item.text: ma mo e ka dza ti spyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud bzhugs so// ma mo e ka dza Ti spyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud ces bya ba/ g.yu'i spyang sngon mo'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i rgyud ces kyang bya'o// dpal rang byung gi rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan lha mo rang byung gi rgyal mo de yang 'og min gyi gnas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang chen por bshegs te mi rtog pa'i don la rtog pa med par bzhugs so// mi 'phro ba'i don la spros pa med par bzhugs so// mi dmigs pa'i don la dmigs pa med par bzhugs so// mi skye ba'i don la skye ba med par bzhugs so// mi 'gag pa'i don la 'gag pa med par bzhugs so// mi 'phro ba'i don la spros pa med par bzhugs so// mi gnas pa'i don la gnas pa med par bzhugs so// mi 'gyur ba'i don

la dus gsum du 'gyur ba med par bzhugs so// lhan ne/ lhag ge lhan ltam mer gnas te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na lha mo bde byed ma de yang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs dang dbyer me phyed par gnas so// de nas lha mo bde byed ma de yang mi dmigs pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ dmigs pa'i tshul du nyid sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa las byung ste/ nyid kyi mdun gyi tshod tsam ste don chos nyid kyi phyogs na gnas te/ 'khor lha mo'i tshogs dang/ sha za dang/ khrag 'thung dang/ nad gtong dang/ khram 'debs dang/ chags byed ma dang/ bde byed ma dang/ za byed ma dang/ gsod byed ma dang/ rmug byed ma dang/ 'phel byed ma la sogs pa mo'i 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na lha mo nag mo bde byed ma de yang byams pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ snying rjes 'gro ba'i don bya ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ drag pos sems can gyi don bya ba dang/ lta ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ dbang dang/ dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ 'phrin las dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ ma nu'i don bya ba'i yid la dgongs nas 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu dus gcig la me tog gi tshogs 'di lta ste/ u t+pal dang/ ut+pal chen po dang/ kun mu ta dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ khu byug lta bu dang/ 'di ltar lha las byung ba dang/ lha ma yin las byung ba dang/ mi las byung ba dang/ yid las byung ba dang/ sa las byung bas kyang gtor ro// kun tu gtor ro// rab tu gtor ro// gzhan yang bdug spos kyi tshogs tsan dan phye ma la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang zas kyi rnam pa dang/ phyi dang nang dang/ gsang ba'i mchod pa dpag tu med pa rnams yid las byung ste/ thogs nas lan brgya stong du mar bskor zhing mchod de 'di skad du/ kye kye dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// bskul lo 'gro ba'i don la bskul// gshegs shig 'phrin las bdag mor gshegs// bskul lo 'phrin las bdag mor bskul// mi dmigs dbyings nas ma g.yos kyang/

'jigs tshul gzugs su bstan du gsol// mi rtog ngang las ma g.yos kyang// rtogs pa bsal phyir dbyings nas bzhengs// bdag ma yin par yid ches phyir// 'gro ba'i don la gsol 'debs na// gnas nas phan pa gdags phyir na// bstan pa'i don la dgongs te gshegs// zhes gsol pas/ dpal lha mo rang byung gi rgyal mo de yang mi rtogs pa'i don las ma g.yos kyang/ 'gro ba'i log rtog bsal zhing bsdu ba'i phyir/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul bskur bzhengs te sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pas sa gzhi khebs pa/ spyi bo'i gtsug na g.yu'i ral pa gyen du bsgreng ba/ zhabs gyad kyi dor stabs su bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na bam chen po'i tsit+ta srog pa rtsa dang bcas nas 'dzin pa/ g.yon na g.yu'i spyang mo khra thabs su bsnams pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gong dang mthun par bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ skad cig tsam dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngang las bzhengs te/ dper na nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang las sprin 'dus pa bzhin du 'am/ chu la chu bur byung ba ltar bur byon to// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na dpal lha mo chen mo rang byung gi rgyal mo de nyid kyi pho brang thugs las bskyed cing spros pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te spros pa/ e yaM raM tsaM keM b+h+ruM rme s+pha ra na phaT ces pas/ nam mkha' kun tu bzang mor bskyed do// de'i steng du yaM pha ra na phaT ces pas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor sra zhing mkhregs pa bskyed do// de'i steng du raM s+pha ra na phaT ces pas/ ra las rak+ti'i rgya mtsho zab cing gting ring ba bskyed do// de'i steng du baM las zhing chen gyi sa gzhi mtsho la dar chags pa ltar bskyed do// de'i steng las s+pha ra na phaT ces pas/ keng rus kyi ri rab dpag cing tshad las 'das bskyed do// de'i steng du bi sha bi shur d+he ban d+ha dz+nya na maN+Dal la e b+h+ruM zhes/ ban d+ha thod pa ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang shar sher dkar ltar dkar ba/ lho baiDUr+Ya ltar sngo ba/ nub byi ru ltar dmar ba/ byang in tra NI la ltar ljang ba/ 'og mthing nag gru gsum drag po/ de'i mtha' ma dbang gi zla gam dmar po/ de'i mtha' bzhi zlum po dkar/ de'i mtha' grur chad rnams bzhi ljang/ de'i mtha' rgyas pa grub bzhi ser mo/ de'i mtha' sgo bzhi rigs dang mthun pa/ de'i mtha' mu khyud nag mo me ri dang bcas pa ste gong dang 'dra bar bskyed do// de'i dbus su+u ma ru tra sti ra baM zhes pas/ bdud ma trang ka ru na dang/ sti ra pho mo'i snying po'o// de'i steng du nyid kyi thugs ka nas ma spros te/ ma su r+Ya maN+Dal zhes pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed do// de'i steng du trag rag taM kha ti ra baM zhes brjod do// nam mkha' stong pa la thogs babs pa ltar rang babs te gnas pa la

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg 'dar/ rab tu 'dar/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig de'i tshe lha dang klu dang bdud dang/ mu stegs dang/ gshin rje la sogs pa thams cad kyis bran dang g.yog tu khas blangs so// dgra dang bgegs rnams ni rang dul du gnas so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dges te/ a a hi hi a la la zhes gsung zhing yi rang ngo// gleng gzhi'i skabs te dang po'o//// de'i tshe de'i dus na dpal lha mo bde byed mas// dgyes dgyes rab tu dgyes/ mgu/ rab tu mgu nas/ hi hi zhes dges pa'i sgra byung ste/ yang gong ltar 'khor rnams dang bcas te bskor ba mang po byed cing zhes phyi nang gi mchod pa dang me tog 'thor zhing 'di skad du/ kye kye dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo ste// bdag gis bstod cing gsol ba las// thugs rjes byon pa rjes yi rang// kye ma rang byung rgyal mo nyid// bdag ni rtag tu khyod la 'dud// bdag ni khyod la gus phyag 'tshal/ khyod la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas// bdag ma yin pa yid ches phyir// gong du gsungs pa'i don rnams la// ma tshang ba yi kha tshar rnams// bdag la legs par bstan du gsol// lta ba spyod pa bsgom pa dang// 'bras bu bya ba ji lta bu// bdag la bstan zhing bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba gsan pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// nga ni mi dmigs mi rtogs pa'i// chos dbyings b+ha ga'i klong gnas tshe// 'gro ba'i don la gsol 'debs pa// lha mo bde byed rjes yi rang/ khyod kyi zhus pa'i don rnams kyis// ma tshang ba yi kha tshar rnams// legs par bshad kyis go bar nyon// nga ni rang byung rgyal mo ste// nga ni e ka dza ti yin// e zhes bya ba lta ba yin// e ni nam mkha' kun tu bzang// e ni sarba d+harma'i sgras// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' yin// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo yin// kun ni mang po thams cad yin// tu+u ni rigs cing 'dus pa yin// bzang mos spang blang med pa yin// a ni chos dbying nam mkha' yin// a ni dbu ma chen po yin// a ni skye ba med pa yin// e ni chos dbyings nam mkha' yin// skye ba med pa'i don rtogs pa// de ni yi ge a ru bstan// ka ni spyod pa'i 'phrin las yin/ sarba ku ru/ karma ka ra ka yi sgras// thams cad bya btsal 'phrin las yin// spyod pa bya byed 'bad rtsol rnams// gong ma'i skye med dang du spyod// skye med dmigs med a ru spyad// a ni skye ba med pa'i don// e ni 'gag med yum gyi dbyings/ skye med 'gag med chos dbyings las// ma g.yos rnams par byed spyod spyad// ti ni tiSh+Tha brtan pa ste// brten

pa'i dgra ni tiSh+Tha yin// tiSh+Tha ma nor brtan pa yin// brtan pa sems nyid bsgom pa yin// sgom pa ting nge 'dzin pa yin// 'dzin pa mi stong stong pa yin// brtan pa 'dzin dang mi stong ba// de ni ting 'dzin ma yengs yin// sems nyid ma skyes mi 'gag la// 'dzin dang brtan dang ma yengs na// ti ni ting nge 'dzin pa ste// rang gi sems nyid tiSh+Tha yin// 'dzin ni 'bras bur bstan pa ste// lta ba dag par bstan pa ni// snang srid yod med bde sdug rnams// ye nas rnam dag chos kyi sku// de ltar rtogs pa lta ba'i don// de la gnas pa sgom pa yin// rtog dang gnas dang ma yengs na// lta sgom mtha' ru phyin pa yin// rtogs dang gnas dang ma yengs rnams// mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu yin// lhag par khyad par mngon gyur na// 'bras bu yin te dza ru bshad// ces gsungs te// gleng bslang zhu ba phul nas lta spyod zhus pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// kye dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// e ka dza Ti zhes bya ba'i// ngo bo dbye ba nges tshig dang// gnas dang 'khor dang 'dul ba'i zhing// de dag byed brag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// e ka dza ti zhes bya yi// de yi ngo bo 'di ltar lags// chos kyi chos ni dag pa dang// rigs pa'i sems nyid stong pa ni// e ka dza ti'i ngo bo yin// chos nyid stong pa'i ngang nyid la// rig pa'i sems nyid gzhag pa ni// e ka dza ti'i ngo bo yin// don dam chos nyid rtogs pa dang// rtogs pa'i don la gnas pa dang// de las mngon du gyur pa ni// e ka dza Ti'i ngo bo yin// e ka dza ti'i dbye ba ni// ye shes e ka dza Ti dang// las kyi e ka dza ti dang// sprul pa'i e ka dza ti'o// sngags kyi e ka dza Ti'o// ye shes e ka dza ti ni// gong ma'i e ka dza Ti yi// ngo bo de las ma g.yos pa'o// sprul pa'i e ka dza Ti ni// gong ma'i de las ma g.yos ngang las sku sprul nas/ sprul pa'i sku ru tshul bstan nas// gsang sngags phyi nang bka' bsrungs zhing// dam tshig nyams pa'i srog kyang gcod// dam la gnas pa'i tshe yang 'dzin// bka' las 'gal ba'i snying yang 'byin// dam tshig can gyi grogs kyang byed// bsgrub pa po yi las byed cing// rnal 'byor yongs kyi sku 'tshol ba// sngags kyi e ka dza ti dang// las kyi e ka dza Ti'o// e ka dza Ti'i nges tshig ni// e ni lta bar bstan pa dang// ka ni spyod par bstan pa dang// Ti ni bsgom par bstan pa dang// dza ni 'bras bur bstan pa ni// e ka dza Ti'i nges tshig yin// don du lta spyod rnam pa bzhi// e ka dza Ti'i nges tshig yin// yang na nges tshig 'di ltar lags// e ka bya ba gcig la zer// dza ti bya ba

ral pa ste// ral gcig ma zhes bya ba yin// don du spyi bo'i gtsug rum na// g.yu yi ral pa yod pa la// nges pa'i tshig tu bos pa yin// rang bzhin gcig tu nges pa med// gong ltar btags pa de ltar yin// e ka dza ti bya ba yin// e ni yum gyi b+ha ga yin// ka ni 'phrin las bdag mo yin// ti ni rig pa'i sems nyid yin// dza ni dpal chen gzungs ma yin// kun tu bzang mo bya ba ba'ang yin// rang byung rgyal mo bya ba'ang yin// sgeg ma chen mo bya ba yin// dpal gyi gzungs ma bya ba yin// sna tshogs rang bzhin tha dad med// ces gsungs so// ngo bo dang/ nges tshig dang/ dbye ba bstan pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// rang byung rgyal mos 'di skad gsungs/ e ka dza Ti'i gnas dang 'khor// gnas ni chos kyi dbyings la gnas// ye shes rig pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// gnas ni rig pa'i sems la gnas// rnam shes tshogs brgyad 'khor gyis bskor// 'dul ba'i zhing yang 'di lta ste// sems las byung ba thams cad dang// nam mkha' khyab pa thams cad la// e ka dza ti'i thugs kyis sprul// gzugs su snang ba thams cad kun// e ka dza Ti'i sku yis 'dul// sgra ru grags pa thams cad kun// e ka dza ti'i gsung gis 'dul// 'dul dang med 'dul gang yang med// thams cad sems su mngon shar bas// sems nyid nang du kun ka rdzogs// sems nyid dbyings su kun dga' gnas// sems kyi dbyings la kun gyis bskor// sems nyid rtogs na thams cad dul// sems nyid rnam par dag pa la// gnas dang 'khor dang 'dul ba'i zhing// bye brag grangs kyis bgrang du med// ces gsungs te/ gnas dang/ 'khor dang/ 'dul ba'i zhing bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// e maho rang byung rgyal mo che// don dam chos nyid bdag mo lags// don dam yang dag nyid du ni// gnas dang 'khor rnams ma mchis kyang// kun rdzob bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas ni gang dang gang du bsgrub// dus ni gang dang gang la gtad// dkyil 'khor maN+Dal ji ltar bri// bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ji ltar dgod// gzas pa'i ming rus ji ltar bri// bskyed dang spyan drangs ji ltar bgyi// mchod cing bstod pa ji ltar lags// rbod rbad gsad pa'i sngags ni gang// bskul zhing 'phrin las ji ltar bcol// pho sngags mo sngags gang dang gang// dbye ba'i thabs dang dbye sngags dang// brtag pa'i thabs ni gang rnams yin// phyi rtags nang rtags gsang rtags dang// rtags med dkrug cing gnad la bor// brdeg pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// las grub mtha' brtul sby-in sreg dang// mnan zhing gzer ba'i 'phrin las dang// mtshan ma'i

bar chod brtags pa dang// bskang ba'i thabs dang spogs pa'i thabs// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// e ka dza Ti bsgrub pa'i gnas// gnas ni dben la nyams dga' dang// bkra shis yo byad phun sum tshogs// ri gsum rtse dang chu gling dang// brag dmar dur khrod shing gcig drung// ngam phug grog phug phu rdugs dang// ri gsum dang ni mi khyim med// de lta bu ru bsgrub par bya// dus ni zla ba bzang po dang// brgyad dang bcu gsum bcu gcig dang// bco lnga bco brgyad nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu lnga dang gnam stong la'o// dkyil 'khor bri las rnam bzhi ste// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag drag/ de mtha' zla gam dmar po dbang// de mtha' zhi ba zlum po dkar// de mtha' rgyas pa gru bzhi ser// de mtha' sgo bzhi rigs dang sbyar// de mtha' lcags ri zlum po me// lho nub dpal gtor byang shar yang// shar lho ling ga byang nub dug/ byang shar tshe dang nyungs kar ro// gzhan yang ces shing dgos pa rnams// rnel gri mo yi ban d+ha la// sngags dang rdzas blugs dar gyis dril// byang gi dbang la bla rdo'i khar// dbus su sku rten 'khar ba la// ling ga btags la rme la bzhag/ ming rus bri ba 'di ltar bri// mgo la ming bris snying khar rus// 'doms su phaT bri tha ma dza// dang por chos nyid de bzhin nyid// gnyis pa kun snang gsum pa rgyu// de la sku bskyed he ru ka/ thugs las e yaM raM baM keM b+h+ruM// 'byung ba rim par brtsegs pa'i steng// bruM las ban d+ha'i gzhal yas khang// nang du gdan bting thugs las trag/ skur bskyed spyan drangs bzhugs gsol phyag/ mchod cing bstod las 'phrin las bcol// rbod cing rbad pa 'di rnams so// sum cu rtsa gnyis bod pas sngags// trag nas b+b+h+yo rbad rbad pa'i sngags// trag nas sod mchod so bzhi pa// rbod dang gsad pa'i sngags rnams so// bskul zhing 'phrin las bcol ba'i tshig ni// mi mngon mkha' dbyings bde chen bya ba dang// 'phrin las rnam bzhi bya bas bskul// pho sngags bstan pa ni/ pho sngags trig trig ces pa ni// yul la brdeg pa'i pho sngags dang// cing lding ta ri don la brdeg/ trig trig pho la ci lde mo// dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di ltar ro// e phaT dga' ba'i mchod ces pas// dbye ba'i sngags su shes par bya'o// brdeg pa'i sngags ni 'di ltar ro// gris su skud pa bcad cing brdeg/ spyi dang khyad par gang yin rnams// bye brag phyi la shes par bya// phyi rtags nang rtags gsang ba'i rtags// de la phyi rtags 'di rnams so// gru gsum dbus sam dkyil 'khor 'khar// 'bu drud 'dra dang byi ba'i rjes// rta glang rjes dang phag pas rlogs// ko kaM snying bus

rtsol 'dra ba// de rnams byung na phyi rtags so// nang rtags bya nag 'ong ba dang// bud med nag mo byung ba dang// ling ga 'dar dang khrag thun lud// de ni nang rtags rdzogs pa'o// gsang ba'i rtags ni 'di rnams so// 'od dang sgra skad snyan po sgrogs// sku gzugs mngon du ston pa dang// tsit+ta sngon du 'ong ba dang// bla rtags mngon du 'ong ba ni// gsang ba'i rtags rnams rdzogs pa'o// dkrug cing gnad la bor ba ni// e trag rag sha mu tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu nag mo ha ma ha ni b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu nag mo tsit+ta ma la b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu nag mo mu ti mkha' 'gro ti ti b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu nag mo ha ra ha ra hrur dug ti hed b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu zhes dkrug par bya'o// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// gnad la 'di yis bor bar bya// ma mo'i sku gzugs byas nas kyang// rang gi rkang pa'i 'og tu gzhug/ ma ma trag rak+sha snying kha rag/ ma ma'i ling ling/ du ma ling ling/ du ma ra na ling ling/ hur ti hur tra/ ma kha le ma tang yaM yaM zhes brjod do// ma mo thams cad lhu 'dre ste// dug gtor nang du chud par bsam// de nas shi sa bsten bya zhing// gnad la rab tu bor bar bya// brdeg pa'i rim pa 'di ltar bya// rtags mtshan mngon du byung 'gyur nas// dgra bo dgug pa'i tshad ldan na// dang po phur bu nyungs kar dang// gri dang 'khar ba bla rdo dang// dug dang khrag dang rtsang gis brdeg/ de dag so so'i sngags dang bcas// rim pa bzhin du brdeg par bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg 'di ltar ro// byang shar mtshams su dug shing la// hoM thab khru gang rtsig bya ste// rkang gling nang nas me sbar te// snying gi nang du ming rus bcug/ gri dang phur bus gdab cing gtub// snying dang ling ga gtub bya zhing// ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi// sngags kyi sbyin sreg bya bar bshad// yang na sbyin sreg 'di ltar bya// ma mo'i 'phrin las gzhung bsrang ste// bskyed phyag spyan drangs bzhugs gsol bya// mchod cing bstod pa phul nas su// sbod rbad gsad pa'i sngags kyi bsreg/ gnan pa'i thabs kyang 'di ltar ro// sku rten 'khar ba sa tshon rab bsdus la// 'khar ba'i 'og tu ling ga gzhug/ sa g.yos 'phrin las rnam bzhis gnan// mtshan ma'i bar chod 'di rnams kyang// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa'i dus su spang// de yang gang dang gang zhe na/ khyi dang bud med mi bsnyen zhing// 'dod chags can la rdzas mi bstan// mi nag mi dang kha mi phrad// sngags la mi tshig spel mi gzhug/ spogs pa'i thabs ni 'di ltar bya// dang por gnas pa 'khar ba'i rje// maN+Dal bri zhing rdzas rnams dgod// 'phrin las gzhung bsrang bzlas brjod dbul// skabs su tshogs dang phud kyis bskang// rme bshags gdung zhing mchi ma dbyung// dmod gzugs

dam brdar 'o 'dod bod// de ltar lan gsum bar du bya// de ltar byas nas gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// 'phrin las rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// e ma ho// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// 'phrin las rgyas pa'i bdag mo ni// nyid kyis 'phrin las btus pa gang// phyi rabs blo dman don ched du// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// 'di dag don kun shin tu zab// nga yis bshad kyi go bar gyis// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// thugs kyi bsgrub pa 'di la ni// dkyil 'khor 'phrin las rnam bzhir bya// dbus su zhing gi snying khrag gis// rgyu yi snying po trag cig bri// dbus su skyer ba'i 'khar ba la// shes rab mtshal dang a mr-i ta// rgya bo khyi yi snying khrag dang// dbang bskur byas la ling ga gdags// yungs kar yungs nag bsngags la brdeg/ rnel gri mo yi ban d+ha la// sol ris byas la khrag sna gsum// dkar kor gsum gyi bskyed bu+u la// byang gis dbang la dar gyis dril// ma mo'i snying po gang yin bzlas// rag ta khol dang tsit+ta dang// don po de yi rjes ngan yong// dngos grub rnam gsum rang dbang bskur// de ltar mngon du gyur pa dang// e phaT ces ni dkrug par bya// de nas byang shar hoM khung du// ra dug ra lcags spyang tsher hoM// rnams kyi gling bus med sbar la// sbar nas ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi// sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya ba'o// tsit+ta byung bar gyur pa na// 'khar ba'i ming rus nang du gzhug/ gong nas 'phreng ba'i mdo 'dzin la// lcags phur mtshon gang ba cig gdags// byin gyis brlabs te snying la brdeg/ stong ngam khri yis 'debs pa dang// gling bus a 'dar byas pa la// 'jam dpal gyis ni gtub bya zhing// sngags kyi sbyin sreg bya ba'o// zhes bya ba'o// 'phrin las btus nas bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// e ma ho rang byung rgyal mo che// 'phrin las don ni rab tu zab// de don yang dag bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// de don man ngag 'di ltar lags// 'di la thog mar bsod nams tshogs bsag rab tu bces// rdzas dang yod byad bsags shing sgrub tu shis pa la// gza' skar drag la gtad de phyi mtshams nang mtshams bcad// bdag nyid che mchog bsgoms te trag las ma mo bskyed// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang drag po'i nang// sku rten btsugs te spyan drangs mchod bstod bya// bla rdo stsal te byang phyogs zla gam la/ kha la thod bskyon nang du snying khrag blugs// sol ris bris la dam nyams bla rdo gzhug/ le

brgan dmar pos dril la steng nas rgya yis gdab// dar la skar khung btod la drag sngags de ru bstim// ling ga brgyangs la sku rten dag la gdags/ khrag khol rlangs pa byung na grub pa'i rtags// rgya zhig tsit+ta byung na grub pa'i rtags// tsit+ta mngon du byung na dbang bskur dgongs pa bya// de nas phyug la gru gsum nang bcug ste// sngags pa byung blta phyogs bzhir mda' thun brdeg/ de steng phur pas brdeg cing mtshon gyi char pa dbab/ khrag thun phab la bla rdos brdung bar bya// ro rnams bsdus te byang shar hoM du bsreg/ rnam bzhi'i stabs kyi thal ba hoM du gnan// yang na ging gi bdag po dag la gtad// thun lam bsal zhing thun khrag dgra la brdeg/ sku rten sa tshon bcas pa dgra la rtse bstan gnan// dgra la rtags byung blangs te gtang rag gtang// gtsang mar sbas la rtag par de la mtshon// las la phyi nas sbyor yang 'khar ba de la bya// zhes gsungs so// 'phrin las mngon par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol ba// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// spyi ru sgrub thabs du ru bstan// phyi ltar bstan cing bshad pa dang// nang ltar bstan cing bshad pa dang// gsang bar bstan pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// sgrub thabs rnam pa drug tu bstan// sku ni 'khar ba les brten la bsgrub// gsung ni khrag la brten la bsgrub// thugs ni snying la brten la bsgrub// yon tan dug la brten la bsgrub// 'phrin las phur pa dag la brten la bsgrub// drag sngags yungs kar dag la brten la bsgrub// sku yi sgrub pa gong du bstan// de la bye brag shes par gyis// de nas nang ltar bstan pa ni// gsung gi bsgrub pa yang dag bshad// de dag nang ltar bstan pa ni// dbang thob gdeng ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ khrag thun mngon du bsgrub 'dod na// sa yi cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum du// sgyed bu gsum khar thod khrag gzhag/ rgyas gdab sol ris le brgan gur// bya rgod sgro rtsa dag nas bsngags// sgo bzhi 'byed pa'i pho nya btang// sngon dmar gzungs thag lcags phur gtod// 'byung bzhi'i ma mor bsgom la gdab/ khrag thun mngon du bsgrub par bya'o// zhes gsungs so/ khrag thun gyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che/ khrag thun mngon du bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// lha mo bde byed tshur nyon cig/ de la drag po'i thun bsgrub ni// bsnol gri mo yi thod pa ru// pad+ma rak+ta bam snying khrag/ rgya

bo khyi yi snying khrag dang// ra yi snying khrag blugs nas su// ya tha'i sngags dang yungs kar blugs// le brgan dar gyis kha bcad la// tshon sna lnga yis bcings la bzhag/ steng 'og thal chen rak+ta yis// g.yung drung rgya yis gdab par bya// don bdun ma b+h+yo'i thog mtha' can// rgyun du grangs pas las rnams byed// ma mo'i rtags rnams byung bar 'gyur// rgya zhig tsit+ta 'phar ba 'ong// gal te byung bar gyur pa na// las la gzud pa rbad pa'i sngags// brgyad pa ma hring thog mtha' can// gong dang spel te bzlas byas na// gong gi rtags rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma rtags la phebs pa dang// gsad pa'i drag sngags drag tu bzlas// rtsa dgu ma yi thog mtha' can// rtag tu bzlas pas las byed 'gyur// gdug pa'i mtshon gyi gris gtub cing// kI la ya yis brdeg par bya// ro cig oM ya'i thog mtha' can// rtsa brgyad trag tu bzlas la btags// drag po'i ma mo thams cad bskul// tsit+ta ling ga hoM la bsreg/ thun khrag lus sam khyim la gtong// ma mo bskul pa 'phang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// thun khrag mngon du bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// e ma rang byung rgyal mo che// snying thun mngon du bsgrub pa gang// bde byed lha mos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// de la snying thun bsgrub 'dod na// mngon du bya ba rdzogs pa dang// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum du// dbus su ban d+ha kha sbyar la// phyi rol dug khrag dmar nag byug/ gri mor shi ba'i snying chen la// nang du snying phye sna tshogs blugs// rgyus chen dag gis btsem par bya// ming rus ling ga sngo dmar gdags// de yang snying gi nang du gzhug/ skud pa srog rtsa'i nang nas dbyung// lcags phur btod la gdug byed bsgom// thod pa'i steng du bu gu dbug/ gri lcags bu gur yungs kar sngags// mthing nag dar ras le brgan gur// rgya dang bcas te sngo dmar bcings// srog gi snying po sngon du bsgrub// rtags dang sbyar la las la sbyar// yungs kar yungs nag sngags la blugs// de nas phur bu dril bya zhing// snying la mgo gzhug med par brdeg/ de nas snying dang ling gar bcas// gtub cing sngags bzlas gtor mar gzhug/ gtor ma bdud kyi nyi ma la// rlung la bskur na phur par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// snying thun bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// snying thun sngon du bsgrub pa gang// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// snying thun sgrub par 'dod pa yis// dkyil 'khor dag la lcags phur dgod// dbus su ban d+ha kha sbyar

la// gri mo'i snying gshags snying phye blugs// gzas pa'i ling ga rkang pas gnan// brtags la srog rtsa'i nang nas drang// gru gsum rtse la phur pas spras// rgyus chen skud pas tsit+ta btsem// sngon dmar skud pas thod pa bcing// lcags kyi spu gu'i nang na mar// nyungs kar sngags la nang du blugs// tsit+ta sngon du 'byung bar 'gyur// tsit+ta 'byung bar gyur pa na// lcags kyi phur pas snying la brdeg/ de nas snying dang ling gar bcas// gtor mar btab cing zhal du blang// 'phrin las gzhung bsrang dgu 'dren btang// gtor ma rlung la phyar la btang// zhes gsungs so// snying thun sngon du bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// snying thun gyi ni bdag mo ni// dug thun yon tan bshad du gsol// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// de la yon tan dug thun ni// shin tu drag po'i mdze thod la// dug dang khrag dang tshil chen la// sna tshogs dug dang khrag tu sbyar// chang dang sbyar la nang du blug/ bsnol mo'i dor rtas kha yang bcad// dug sngags drag pos dug thun bsgrub/ khol lam rlangs byung spos pa na// dug thun mngon du grub pa yin// de nas gzugs dang ling ga rnams// dug gi rlangs pas ling ga 'dug/ de nas gzugs dang ming rus bcas// gru gsum bcug la dug gis brdeg/ dug gis myos shing shi bar bsam// zhes gsungs so// dug thun bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// dug thun mngon par bshad du gsol// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// dug thun mngon du bsgrub 'dod na// dkyil 'khor gru gsum mchod rten dbyibs// dug dang thal chen sol bas byugs// thod 'phreng rdo rje rwa ba dang// mchod pa la sogs pa bris// dug gis shi ba'i thod pa ru// tsan dug spangs dug khyi dug dang// ra dug bong dug thal nur dang// bong nga nag po khyi lce ba// bse zho skyung chang sbrang rgod blugs// steng du rtsang dang mchog phur gyis// gzugs dang ming rus rgyang la gtub// trag las ma mo nag mo bskyed// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol mchod bstod bya/ kha nas dug gi na bunu 'thul// dug gi ral pas sa gzhi khebs// phyag na dug gi phor pa bsnams// sems can thams cad myos par byed// sku+u la dug gi spyang mo 'phro// dug gi ma mo pho nyar 'gyed// de ltar bsgom la dug bsngags bzlas/ khol dang lud dang sbos pa dang// dud 'thul 'od 'phro me 'bar na// dug thun mngon du grub pa yin// de nas gzugs dang ming rus rnams// gru gsum bcug la ming gis brdeg/ dug sngags gdug pa drag sngags bzlas/

dug gis myos shing shi bar bsam// lhag ma dgra yi phyogs su 'phang// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// dug gi na bun 'thibs par bsam// dug gis thams cad brlag par gyur// zhes gsol to// dug thun mngon par bsgrub pa'i skabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// phur thun gdug byed bshad du gsol// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// gdug byed phur thun 'di ltar sgrub// dkyil 'khor gru gsum mthing nag la// dbus su zur gsum mthur du brko/ kha khyer thod 'phreng me ris bskor// lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad la// gdug byed nag mor bsgom par bya// ming rus gzugs dang ling ga yang// phur pa de la gdags par bya// gu gul dud pas lha dang dbral// phur pa dbang bskur zur gsum gzugs// bskyed cing spyan drangs gdug byed bsgom// drag po'i phur thun bsgrub par bya// rtags dang mtshan ma thon par bya// de nas phur pa dril bar bya// gdug byed phur pa ming rus brdeg/ de nas byang shar hoM du bsreg/ ces gsungs so// phur thun mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// phur thun mngon du bstan du gsol// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// gdug byed phur thun 'di ltar bsgrub// lcags sam drag po'i phur pa la// tshe dang ldan par byas nas kyang// spyi bor oM la mgrin pa A// bskyed par hUM la rtse mor phaT// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur bya// ye shes lngar ldan dbang bskur la// gdug byed nag mor bskyed par bya'o// gzas pa'i gzugs dang ming rus dang// sol ba tshig phye dri ma dang// sha chen khrag chen zhing ras dang// go ro tsa na la sogs la// chag gang gzugs la dngang po dod// ras sam gro ga shing shun la// ming rus bris la mdun rgyab glan// tshon skud lngas bkyig phur pa la// btags la gu gul dud pas bdug/ de nas dkyil 'khor gru gsum la// gru gsum dbus su sor gsum bru/ kha khyer thod 'phreng me ris bskor// de na phur bu gzugs par bya// gdug byed nag mo nga nyid kyang// phur pa de la bskyed cing bstim// snying khrag srog pa rtsa yi khrag/ pad+ma rak+ta'i gtor ma dang// chang phud sman dang spyan gzigs kyang// gdug byed nag mo nyid la dbul// de la gdug byed phur thun bsgrub// grub rtags 'od dang du ba dang// me 'bar sgra dang dri zhim na// 'bar ba'i sngags bzlas gzugs la brdeg/ da ra hing gi ming la brdeg/ da ra lib kyi ru la brdeg/ de nas lus spyir ts+tshin d+has brdeg/ de nas gzugs dang ming rus de/

nA ga gnas pa'i sa ru sba// yang na byang shar hoM du bsreg/ de yis gzas pa phung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'phrin las phur thun mngon par bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// thun rnams kun kyi bdag mo na// drag sngags bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// drag sngags zhes su gsungs pa yang// pho sngags dang ni mo sngags so// mo bas mo ni rab tu trag/ pho bas pho ni rab tu trag/ de yang gang dang gang zhe na// dkrug dang ru zlog dus su drag/ de la drag sngags bsgrub pa 'di// yungs kar rgyal mo dang po bsgrub// nyungs kar rgyal po grub pa dang// lcags tsam gyi ni tshad du 'od// de nas yungs kar rgyal po de// ban d+ha srub gsum nad du blugs// nyungs kar sgrub pa'i snying por bzlas// mtshan ma drod la phebs pa dang// nyungs kar sgrol ba'i ging du bsgom// nyungs kar gri dang mtshon du bsgom// nyungs kar khro bo khro mor bsgom// nyungs kar mda' dang mdung du bsgom// de ltar bsgom pa'i nyungs kar de// dmigs pa'i ling ga nyid la brdeg/ de yis sgrol bar gdon mi za// gson po gsad dang yi dwags bskrad// rang lus bsrung dang thog ser dbab// lha klu gzir dang sad ser bcad// dmigs pa'i las rnams thams cad 'grub// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// yang snying thugs kyi rgyal pos bya// brdeg na gang yin gsod pa ste// phung byed drag sngags gzer ba'i thabs// dkrug na srin po'i go bzlog ste// srid pa gsum yang 'khrug par 'gyur// pho yi bsad pa ru bzlog dang// dkrug dang gcun dang bsad pa'i las// rab tu bsgrims te bzlas par bya// zhes gsungs so// drag sngags nyungs kar la brten nas bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// de dag bsgrub pa'i drag sngags gang// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// de dag bsgrub pa'i drag sngags rnams// mngon du bstan pa shes par bgyis// mdo tsam du yang 'di ltar bstan// trag trag ma du ya/ lnga pa sku bskyed pa'o/ trag trag kur lan tug tug oM AHhUM/ dgu pa ste dbang bskur ba'o// trag rag sha kha mun tra// e ha ri sa ma ya hUM dza// bcu bzhi pa ste snyan gsan dbab pa'o// de bzhin du dzaHhUM baM ho/ ma ma ma kha rag sha hUM hUM hUM hri hri/ bco brgyad pa spyan drang pa'o// ru ru ro ru tsa pa la na mo// ma ma ro sham na mo e ka dza Ti pa la ya mi sha b+h+yo na mo rtsa dgu pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o/

trag rag sha sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan// dgu pa bzhugs pa'o// e ka dza Ti li li ta li raM pa// ba ling ta raM pa khA hi/ bcu drug pa pu tsa dbul ba'o// trag rag kha mu tra mu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rag mo te ke ma tsa tsa kha la ma hi b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma hi b+h+yo/ so gnyis pa ste bod pa'o// trag rag sha kha mu tra snying kha rag srog rbad/ tsit+ta long rak+ta thun b+h+yo/ chum chum ri ri li li b+h+yo rbad b+h+yo// bcu gsum pa rbad pa'o// trag sha badzra kha/ chum thum ri li li b+h+yo rbad b+h+yo/ pra ti sa man tsa// sman pra ti sa man tsa/ ni kham mag khum khum mag mag sod// so gnyis pa gsad pa'i sngags// trig trig ser ser/ ku lu ku lu/ mo ku mo ku/ ha tsa ha tsa/ ma ta dza la kha he/ tseg ra ling/ mu ru myos/ lding ldang bu phyug phyug mi ha te bshal bshul/ mu hu sa ne tsa na tsig tsig mu tram tring/ he le he he/ bu ru tsis tsing/ myog myog thum kar ldan mi ha te/ ku mu ru ce ye phaT ni// don gcig yul la brdeg pa'i pho sngags/ tsi lang ka ye/ kod kod mi he he/ mya mya mya mi tse/ ku ha tse ne mu tra ye/ kar min tring tring/ phrab phrab phrib phrib/ tsing ling mi lo ka ya bi shi bi myogs ta ri/ zhe gnyis pa mo sngags nang gi rtsa la brdeg pa'o// e phaT ni gsum par dkrug pa'o// pra be sha phaT/ tsi bi shag te myog shu gu aM gu sha dza dza/ tsi ta gu la sma ra ma shag dza dza/ bcu drug pa srog kha khung kha dbye ba dang/ yid kyi rnam shes drang ba'o// tsit+ta ku la sma ra ma shag ti dza dza/ yig 'bru bcu pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa drang ba'o// e ka dza ti sma ra ya kha ti dza dza/ bcu gcig pa nyon mongs pa'i yid rmugs su gzhug pa'o// baM rmugs rbad thibs/ ling shar nges sod// brgyad pa tsit+ta nang nas bcad pa'i sngags so// hUM ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha ma ra ya na ga shag du pra be sha phaT/ phur pas brdeg cing bsad pa'o// snying bam ril// snying kha rag tshal pa rbad/ 'ur rbad phaT/ tsag le mu ru baM/ e te phaT/ ni tseg sod sod/ 'ud myogs thum ril a lo sha 'ud kha thum/ snying dum bu rbad/ dus srog khyer yag bam ril rbad/ snying thun bsgrub pa'o// trag rag sha kha mun tra mun tra/ e ka dza ti snying kha rag ma b+h+yo// bcu bdun pa ste ya snying nas bod pa'o// trag raka sha sa ma ya dgra bo'i snying ling rbud// bcu gcig pa rbad pa'o// ma ma snying kha rag snying rag ma ma rag sha ma ma rag sha rag mo snying la thun/ trag rag sha ya/ ma ma snying he keM ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ khog sprugs drol cig snying kha rag sa ma ta dza dza/ snying tsa phyung zhig ma ma snying ma tsit+ta la ma thun/ snying khrag la ma thun/ shi ti ta ma snying la ya ma b+h+yo/ ma ma sha sha/ ma ma hreng hreng/ ma ma sa ma ya/ dgra bo N+ri mA ra ya sod sod/ ma tsit+ta dz+wa la raM/ snying tsa la rol thum ri li li/ ma las myur bar mdzod cig/ brgya rtsa gsum la khrag thun

sgrub pa'o// oM badzra da ra lig oM badzra snying gong chod cig khal dza mun ta lo/ dun ting mA' ra ya rbad/ oM badzra khrag ting snar ma rbad/ oM badzra tsa tu kri ta ya hUM badzra hUM badzra phaT// rbad tu rbad tu/ rbad pu rbad pu/ da ra ka ya/ stim pi shi stangs sa ma ya/ ro gcig pa khrag thun grub nas snying la brdeg pa'o// ma ma trag rag sha thum ri li li/ ba la dug kun dug e ka dza Ti tip+ta tsakra ma b+h+yo// rtsa bzhi pa dug thun bsgrub pa'o// oM A be sha kha se sha be be sha ru pe sha ma thun b+h+yo/ shog tham shog tham/ baM thaM baM thaM/ baM mugs baM mugs/ myos brgyal myos brgyal/ na ni staM pa nan/ bzhi bcu pa dug thun brdeg pa'i mnan pa'o// oM me da ra hing thum ril rbad/ oM me de ra lig snying kha rag rbad/ oM tsa ra ma snying kha rag ra sh+ti badzra thun b+h+yo/ sum cu pa phur thun gyi ming dang gzugs la brdeg pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI li la ya/ tsit+ta rbud khug ya/ phug myogs thum ril/ zhung zhung/ chum chum/ rbad na rbad na/ kI li kI li ya/ rag sha rag sha khum khum tri ta baM rbad/ bzhi bcu pa snying la phur pa rdeg pa'o// ma mo trag rag sha snying khra rag ma ma ling ling/ dum ling ling/ du ma ra na/ tri hUM tri/ hur hur/ che ge mo ma tang ya ya/ so drug pa dkrug pa'i sngags so// trag rag sha kha mu tra b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu nag mo ha ni b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// nag mo tsit+ta ma la b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu nag mo mu ti/ kha 'gro ti ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu har hur hed/ b+h+yo ru lu ru lu/ bcu drug pa ste gcun pa'i sngags so// gzhan yang dgos pa sngags rnams kun bshad kyis mi lang la brjod kyis mi rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// thun dkrug gi sngags kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// 'khar ba la sogs thun rnams kyi// grub pa'i rtags ni gang dang gang// ma grub rtags ni ji ltar 'byung// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma/ spyir na gnyis shes par gyis// spyi dang khyad par gnyis su bstan// spyi yi rtags rnams bstan pa ni// bud med byung na dngos grub 'phel// khyo gar byung na dgra la myur// btsun par byung na 'khor la gzan// bya nag byung na thugs dam bskang/ khyi ru byung na dam tshig nyams// phyi bshags nang bshags gsang bshags bya/ khrus dang mdos dang bskang bshags bya// bstod gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// bdun par bdun par bdun gsum brjod// gtso mchog yin pas nyams su blang// mon mo byung na mo nyid dngos// grub yin pas dngos grub blang// ma grub rtags rnams bstan pa ni// btsun mo lta bur byung na ngan// jo mo lta bur byung na

ngan// phar la phyag 'tshal shin tu ngan// lug dang rta ru byung na ngan// snying mi dga' zhing 'gro snying 'dod// 'di ni rang nyes nyams su brtag/ bskang ngo cho ga rgya cher bya// seng seng byed na gsal zhing sbrid// bya nag lug nag thugs dam bskang// ltogs la gzhan gyi zas 'dod na// phud dang gtor mas thugs dam bskang// bying zhing 'thib na sgrib pas phog/ bskang zhing bshags pa bya ba dang/ khrus dang tshangs pa'i cho ga bya// g.yel zhing mi 'khor rkyen yod pa'i// gsal zhing nyams dag bka' nyan yin// gzhal yang grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// 'a ma lta bur byung na bzang// sgyug mo lta bur byung na bzang// mdza' mo lta bur byung na bzang// sring mo lta bur byung na bzang// bran mo ltar bur byung na bzang// grogs bshes lta bur byung na bzang// bza' skom gter ba byung na bzang// bkur sti phyag 'tshal bskor ba byed// de rnams bzang ba'i rtags su bshad// gzhan yang rtags kyi rnam pa ni// mdze can pho mor 'ong ba dang// yugs sa mo ru 'ong ba dang// rnal 'byor pho mo long sprang dang// ngu zhing chos ngas 'debs pa dang/ kha sbub nyal zhing 'dug pa dang// b+ha ga zur sprel ston pa dang// 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' me 'bar dang/ khrag gi na bun 'thul ba dang// gnag rgod mi thub brdung ba dang// mtsho chen 'khyug cing rmi ba dang// 'di dag ngan pa'i rtags yin pas// phyi nang bskang bshags drag tu bya// 'o dod brang brdung che nges rdeb// phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul rmi zhing brdung// de rnams phyi yi rtags yin no/ khyad par rtags rnams bstan pa la/ khrag thun rtags rnams bstan pa la// rak+ta mngon du khol ba dang// me 'bar 'od 'phro sgra snyan sgrogs// dud pa 'thul dang rlungs pa 'byung// de tshe gsung gi dngos grub blang// gong gi rtags rnams byung ba'i tshe// de tshe sku yi dngos grub blang// de bas snying thun rtags rnams ni// tsit+ta mngon du 'ong ba dang// snying 'phar ba dang 'bar ba dang// tsit+ta 'phyar zhing ston pa dang// bla rtags dngos su 'ong ba dang// sku gzugs dngos su ston pa'o// de yi thugs kyi dngos grub blang// dug thun rtags rnams bstan pa ni// dug gi thun snod 'chag pa dang// 'phar dang 'gul dang ldeg pa dang/ khol dang rlangs byung sbos pa dang// me 'bar ba dang 'phro ba dang// dri zhim pa dang lud pa ni// dug thun grub pa'i rtags yin pas// de nas yon tan dngos grub blang// de ting dug thun drag pos brdeg/ phur thun rtags rnams bstan pa ni// gru gsum dbus kyi phur pa'i rtsar// gcan gzan rjes byung grub pa yin// gzhan yang rjes rnams gang byung ba// de yang phur thun grub pas rtags// phur pa 'gul dang ldeg pa

dang// 'od 'phro ba dang me 'bar dang// de yang phur thun grub pa'i rtags// 'phrin las sid+d+hi blang bar bya// phur thun drag pos brdeg byas la// yungs thun rtags rnams bstan pa ni// nyungs kar 'phar zhing mchod pa dang// nyungs kar 'tshig cing sgra thon dang// nyungs kar btsos byin gyur pa dang// nyungs kar drag po grub pa'i rtags// drag sngags smod pa'i sid+d+hi blang// drag sngags nyungs thun rab tu brdeg/ trig ser gri la tsi lding ngar// tsi ling gri la trig ser ngar// dkrug dang ru bzlog dus su bzus// pho mo bsad pa phur bzlog dang// dkrug dang gcun pa'i man ngag gis// dmigs pa'i ling ga rab tu brab// dbang po phyi dang kun gzhi nang// yang dang yang du brdeg par bya// srid pa gsum yang sgrol bar byed// ces gsungs so// thun drug gi rtags bstan pa'i skabs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// rtags dang mtshan ma'i bdag po ni// de bas khyad par dgra rtags gang// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// de la dgra rtags bstan pa ni// g.yag dang ra dang ba glang gsod// de yang dgra rtags 'bring po yin// ri dwags gsod dang gcan gzan gsod/ khyi ra byed dang sha rkyang gsod// rnyi byas bya byi gsod pa dang// rgya byas ri dgas gsod pa dang// go gon mtshon brdung mda' sgron na// dmag 'dran g.yul sprod 'thab pa dang// shing gcod me sbor brag gshog dang// de rnams byung na dgra rtags yin// de dgra 'bring po'i rtags rnams yin// gzhan po byed cing 'dug pa dang// lag nas mtshon cha shor ba dang// go cha gzhan la byin pa dang// bdag rang gcig pu 'dug pa dang// sa yi 'og tu nub pa dang// thur la bab cing rmi ba dang// g.yang du lhung dang gcig pur 'dug/ de ni the ma'i rtags su bstan// gzhan yang bzangs pa'i rtags rnams ni// dmag dpung che dang 'grogs na bzang// 'thabs te mtshon thob rgyal na bzang/ kha rong btsan chud na bzang// tsit+ta byin zhing rmi na bzang// mgo dang yan lag gcod na bzang// lus la tshon rtsis byug na bzang// thig gis 'debs kyin rmi na bzang// brtab pa byed cing rmi na bzang// mgo dang yan lag gcod na bzang// 'og tu bcug nas gsod pa dang// bla rtags mngon du 'ong ba dang// tsit+ta khyer zhing bstod pa dang// mgo bo gcod cing ston pa dang// gson bla mngon du 'ong ba ni// de ni rtags rnams rdzogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// dgra rtags bstan pa'i skabs te le'u bcu dgu pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol

pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// dgra bgegs rtags kyi rgyal mo nyid// thun drug sgrub pa byed pa'i tshe// 'phrin las rim pa ji ltar bgyi// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// sngangs srungs nag mo bsgrub 'dod na// dang por tshogs bsags sgrib pa sbyang// de nas 'phrin las 'di ltar bya// de yang gnas ni dur khrod gling du bsgrub// dur khrod sa la dkyil 'khor ni// 'phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par bri// e ka dza Ti zhes bya ni// las byed gtso mo bsgrub 'dod na// 'phrin las rim pa 'di yis bya'o// de bzhin nyid la blo sbyangs te// mi rtogs gdeng du gyur pa dang// kun tu snang la blo sbyangs te// thams cad 'od du gyur pa las// slar 'dus yi ge hUM du gyur// stan dang de la dbang chen gyis// sa bon yi ge 'di rnams spro// e yaM raM suM keM las ni// rim pa bzhin du bskyed bya ste// b+h+ruM las ban d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// dregs pa'i gdan steng hUM bsam ste// rdo rje 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de/ khro mo yum dang bcas pa gcig/ rang sems dag pa'i ngo bor gsal// de ni rgyu yi ting 'dzin to// de las ma mo bskyed pa ni// gru gsum nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// bdag nyid che mchog thugs ka nas// yi ge trag las sngags 'di bskyed// trag trag ma du ya zhes pas// gru gsum trag dang 'khar ba las// nag mo khro gnyer ral pa can// ral pa'i zar pus sa gzhi khebs// sku dang ral pa'i gsebs nas kyang// g.yu yi spyang mo dgu 'bum 'phro// g.yas na mi snying dmar po bsnams// g.yon pa g.yu yi spyang mo 'gyed// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// gzas pa khrag skyug gzir ba cig/ yid kyi rigs can gsal bar bskyed// bdag gi thugs las de 'dra gcig/ bskyed pa bstim par de la bya// trag trag ser ser dug/ snying po de brjod rak+ta dang// chang phud sbyar bas dbang yang bskur// bsgrub pa'i gnas nas spyan drangs la// ma mo de la bstim par bya// de nyid mngon du gsal bsgom la// gtor ma rabs chad ban d+ha re// ma mo de la dbul bar bya// e ka dza ti ti li ti li// raM ba raM ba khwa hi// bstan dang stobs su gyur pa dang// ma gcig ma yi yang snying ni// trag dang b+h+yo yi thog mtha' can// bcu bdun pa ni drang bar bya// ma mo'i rtags ni ci 'dod 'byung// bcu gcig trag rbad thog mtha' can// brgya yi 'jug tu re re gdags// de ni bsnyen pa thog mtha' ste// rtags dang de dang 'bral mi bya'o// bar bar bskyed dang spyan drang dang// brtan bzhugs phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul bstod// ces gsungs so// 'phrin las bstan

pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol pa// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo che// dkyil 'khor 'phrin las bdag mo ni// nyid kyi dbang bskur ji ltar lags// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// dbang la rnam pa gsum yod de// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// e ka dza Ti sgrub 'dod pas// dang por bla ma brtags byas la// mnyes pa'i yon 'bul dbang rnams zhu// de yang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang// bum pa la sogs dbang rnams bsog/ bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod byas la// bzlas brjod 'phro 'du'i tshul bzhin bya// rtags rnams byung na slob ma gzhug/ de yang bya ba 'di dag go khrus dang drang ba sgo dbye dang// gsol gdab dam dpog gzhug pa dang// dbang rnams rim par bskur bar bya// dang po phyi dang gnyis pa nang// gsum pa gsang dbang bskur bar bya// phyi yi bum pas bskur ba dang// nang gi sngags dang bdud rtsi dang// gtor ma rak+ta phur pa dang// nyungs kar thun rdzas dbu rgyan dang// lan bu spu gri drag sngags dang// sku gzugs sbyor sgrol dbang rnams so// gzhan yang sku gsung thugs dang ni// yon tan 'phrin las dang ni// man ngag bstan pa la sogs pas// bsgrub dang bsgom dang rbad pa dang// gsad dang 'phang ba'i dbang rnams bskur// gsang ba'i dbang rnams bskur ba dang// gzungs ma mtshan ldan khrus dang rgyan// mkha' gsang byin brlabs sbyor ba bya// gsang dbang dam pa bskur bar bya// dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// e ka dza Ti bsgrub nas 'grub// e ka dza Ti bsnyen na nye// e ka dza Ti bkol na nyan// bsgrub pa'i tshe na ma bas nye// bsnyen pa'i tshe na bsring bas gdung// gsang ba'i tshe na bu bas nyan// bos pa'i tshe na glog bas mgyogs// bsad na tshangs pa'i tshe yang sdud// gsos na dbang po 'gags kyang 'tsho// tshe 'dir bsam dgu 'grub pa dang// nor dang 'byor ba 'phel bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// bde byed lha mos yang gsol ba// dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mo nyid// rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsrung ba'i dam tshig gang gang lags// rang byung rgyal mos bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol pas/ rang byung rgyal mos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo bde byed ma// bsrung ba'i dam tshig rnam pa gnyis// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig go/ spyi yi dam tshig 'di rnams bsrung// phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig kyang// rtag par rgyun du bsrung bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig kyang// thun mong spyi dang khyad par

grangs// spyod pa rgyud dang 'gal mdo nyes// de dag rnams kyang bsrung bar bya// yi dam lha yi dkyil 'khor dang// bla ma slob dpon mched lcam yang// rtse gcig rgyun du bsgom par bya// gzhan yang 'di rnams bsrung bar bya// rtag tu ma mo bsgom par bya// rgyun du srog 'dzab drang bya zhing// mchod cing bstod la bskul zhing rbad// nyams pa dag dang kha m-i bsre// yugs sa dag dang zla mi gcig/ 'khon dang nyams pa dag la gzem// rdo rje spun dang 'khon mi bya// sngags pa nang dang 'thab mi bya// rtag par de dag bsrung par bya// de ni spyi yi dam tshig go khyad par 'di dag bsrung bar bya// sku yi dam tshig bsrung bar bya// skra yang mi bcad ral par bskyil// tsher ma can gyi 'khor ba bcad// rtags kyi phyag rgya lus la bcang// drag po'i las rnams bdud chas bya// gsung gi dam tshig 'di rnams bsrung// mchod pa'i khas blangs mi bcag par// mi nag mi dang kha mi bsre// bzlas pa rgyun du mi 'bral zhing// gar dga' ma mo mi bod cing// 'byung ba lnga la mi smod pa// dkon mchog spyi la bstod pa bya// bran la kha ngan mi bya zhing// sngags las mi tshig spel mi gzhug/ dbang ma thob pa'i mi rnams dang// tshig gi zur yang smra mi bya// thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// rnam par mi rtogs chos nyid la// bsgom pa thun re mi 'bral zhing// yi dam lha yang mgo ru yod// dus gsum lha ru bsgom par bya// brda ngan ma yi bud med dang// chags pa'i lus sems g.yo mi bya// yid du 'ong ba'i mdza' mo dang// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// mkhas pas bsgrub pa'i grogs su bkri// gzhan yang dam tshig 'di dag bsrung// dben nas hul po mi gshig cing// mchod pa gtor ma rgyun mi bcad// dam tshig mi bstan sha mi spang// rak+ta gtor ma ma la gtor// phud dang mthun rdzas nyams mi bya// zhes gsungs so// dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// e ka dzA Ti'i rgyud phyi ma drag sngags kyi rgyud rdzogs so// za byed spyang rgyal nag mo'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ shri badzra kA li shi bi dza ti g+hu ya kar ma tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje nag mo ral pa spyi bcings gsang ba 'phrin las kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal 'jigs byed chen po/ gsang ba dur khrod chen po chags pa rnam dag rang grol ba zhes bya ba'i klong na/ rang bzhin gyi ye nas gnas pa'i bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ dges pa chen po'i sgra ma hA su ka zhes brjod pas/ lhag pa ye shes kyi

'khor rnams dang/ ched du 'dzin pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor dang/ las kyi 'dus pa las kyi mkha' 'gro sha za 'bum dang/ dregs pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dges ba chen po'i ngang du bka'i stobs kyis rang dbang med par 'dus so// de yang ji ltar 'dus na/ lhag pa'i ye shes chen po phyi nang gsang ba gsum 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas te/ b+ha ga dag pa brdal ba'i klong nas/ rig pa ye shes lha'i dngos pos mtshon cha gdug pa 'dul ba'i don gyi na/ mi sgrib pa'i ye shes chen po phyi nang med par shes te yongs su 'khod de/ ched du 'dzin pa mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi yi tshul du snang ba ni/ pho nya thams cad kyi gtso mo/ bdud mo thams cad kyi rgyal mo/ sman phran thams cad kyi gtso mo/ nyul le ma thams cad kyi gtso mo/ 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams la mnga' mdzad cing bka'i bya ra bar dgongs nas gnas pa/ nag mo 'bum gyi gtso mo re ma ti dang/ smugs mo 'bum gyis gtso mo re ma tri dang/ ser mo 'bum gyi gtso mo re ma dza dang/ dkar mo 'bum gyi gtso mo re ma dzu la sogs pa ni/ las bzhi mngon du mdzad par dgongs te/ phyogs bzhi na bzhugs so// las kyis 'dul ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ khrag mtsho 'khor ma'i nang la gnas pa/ ro dang dbugs kyi dbas dang ngad kyi khrag mtsho skyil zhing skol ba/ bud med nag mo 'bum srid pa'i tshe srog la dbang byed pa/ gnod sbyin bdud kyi cha lugs 'chang ba/ dbang po'i stobs can dang/ mig gi mtshon cha can dang/ rna ba'i mtshon cha can dang/ sna'i mtshon cha can dang/ lce'i mtshon cha can dang/ lus kyi mtshan cha can dang/ yid kyi mtshon cha can dang/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang/ dug gi mtsho dang/ rak+ti'i khrag gi mtsho dang/ zhag gi mtsho las bzhengs te/ me dpung nas bzhengs pa dag/ nag mo thod pa'i khrag spyod ma dang/ smug nag thod pa'i khrag spyod ma dang/ ser nag thod pa'i khrag spyod ma dang/ ljang nag thod pa'i khrag spyod ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa sprul pa bye ba sa yar bcas pa dag go/ 'khor du 'dus pa'i dregs pa can gyi tshogs ni/ bdud dang/ gshin rje dang/ gnod sbyin/ srin mo dang/ ging gi tshogs dpag tu med pa/ dug gi na bun dang// dug rlangs kyi ngad rab tu tshab/ nad kyi rlangs pa sprin du chags pa/ khrag dang dug gi bu yug rlung dmar du 'khrug pa/ nad kyi mtshon sprin 'khrigs pa/ yid kyi dug mda' tsha tshar 'phro ba/ la la ni me spor ba sha stag go/ la la ni khrag gi mtsho skol ba dag go/ la la ni khrag mtsho nang nas bzhengs te dmod pa 'dor ba bdag go/ la la ni dur khrod na dmod pa 'dor ba sha stag go/ la la ni spyugs pa'i glus 'khor bsdus pa dag go/ la la ni dar

nag gi g.yab mo 'dor ba dag go/ la la ni gdug pa'i 'o dod dang nga ro mi snyan pa sgrog pa sha stag go/ de dag kyang khro zhing gtum pa rmongs pa'i mtshon cha can sha stag go/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ com ldan 'das kyis rngam pa'i sgra/ ma ma ru lu shri/ ma hUM ma hUM/ dza dza b+h+yo dza dza b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ zhes ched du brjod pas nam mkha' nyid e gru gsums par gyur to// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug go/ las kyi rlung rdo rje rgya gram phyogs bcur 'thor ro// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro thams cad ni bred/ rab tu bred/ kun tu rab tu bred de rings par rgyug cing/ dga' ba'i tshul gyis gtso bo la 'dud do// la la ni ngu ba'i tshul gyis 'dud do// la la ni dngang pa'i tshul gyis 'dud do// la la ni rngam pa'i tshul gyis 'dud do// la la ni stobs bri ba'i tshul gyis 'dud do// de'i tsher rang rtags srog gi snying pos rnams gtso bo la phul lo// de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung 'bar ba des/ srog gi yi ge 'bar ba de dag nus pa'i mthu can du byin gyis brlabs te/ dregs pa'i 'khor de dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa de kho nar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ ma mo de dag gi nang nas lha mo bde byed nag mo zhes bya ba mngon du phyung ste ral pa spyi bcings su byas te/ rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar te gus pa'i tshul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal// 'bar ba'i rgyal po he ru ka/ 'bar byad 'jigs pa'i gtum rngam gyis// khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku khros te// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro dbang bsdus nas// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i lha ni ba// bdag cag ma mo mkha' 'gro yi// don gyi ngo bo rang bzhin gang// ming dang mkhan du grags pa gang// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don ldan pas// bsten cing bsgrub pa bya ba dang// 'phrin las sbyor ba ji lta bu// rtsa ba yan lag sbyor ba yi// las kyi sbyor ba ji lta bu// 'bar byed sku la bdag nyen 'tshal// ces gsol to// de nas rdo rje dpal khrag 'thung de nyid 'phrin las rgya mtsho 'gro ba sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ 'di dag ched du brjod par gyur to// nyon cig mkha' 'gro bde byed ma// chos nyid b+ha ga brdal yangs nas// 'gyur med ye shes kun khyab bo// don gyi ngo bo rnam 'byor sku// 'phrin las rnam bzhi sku la rdzogs// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro rtsa brgyad stong// dbyings las ye shes sku shar ba'o// rang bzhin kho na spros dang bral// nam mkha' chos ltar ye klong yin// ming ni rnam pa dgur grags te// pho nya rgyu ba'i tshul du snang// dngos ni mkha' 'gro rnam pa bzhi// dus bzhi 'byung ba'i rgyal mo yin// mkhan ni bcu phrag bcu ru grags// rtsa brgyad stong du gyur pa

ste// nag mo 'bum pa dbang bsgyur ba'i// rigs kyi gtso mo'i snang tshul yin// rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// nye gnas rnam bzhi'i tshul du bsgrub// 'phrin las sbyor ba du ma las// 'di ni rnam pa gsum du ste// bsgrub dang dmod pa drag sngags so// bsgrub pa srog bsgrub rtsa ba dang// drag po'i thun du shes par bya// thun la mang du bshad kyis kyang// rnam grangs bzhi yang snying po gcig/ bsgrub pa'i dkyug dang so ru bshad// dmod pa ma mo gcig pu nyid// las kyi bcong du bzhag pa yin// drag po sngags ni mnga' sgyur te// phyi dang nang ni khang bu la// nag mo drag sngags dza dur te// tre mo shu shur bsgrub pa yin// yan lag so so'i mtshan nyid can// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin 'grub pas// rtsa brgyad stong gi bsgrub par bshad// ces gsungs so// de nas bde byed lha mo ral pa spyi bcings kyis gsol ba/ e ma rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal// nag mo ral pa spyi bcings kyi// nye bar bsdus pa'i gsang rgyud 'dir// rgyud ces bya ba ci la bya// ma mo bzhi yi don ni gang// go rims 'brel ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// rtsa brgyud stong gi rgyud chen las// nag mo ral pa spyi bcings kyi// gsang ba nye ba'i rgyud du bshad// rgyud ces bya ba 'brel ba'i don// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// lta spyod dkyil 'khor dam tshig dbang// las rims 'brel bas rgyud ces bya// gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu'o// ma mo zhes bya ba'i don nyid ni// chos dbyings skye ba med pa la// dbyings kyi ma mo zhes su bshad// sna tshogs longs sku rdzogs pa la// ye shes zhes su yang dag bshad// zhi rgyas dbang drag sku la rdzogs// 'phrin las sna tshogs ma 'gag pas// yul dang las kyi ma mo yin// las rims 'brel ba'i bshad pa'i don// bsgral ba dmigs kyi dam pa la// las kyi zor thun bsgrub pa'i phyir// gnas dang las kyi rim pa dang// bskyed cing rtsa ba'i snying po bod// thugs dam bskul zhing grub rtags blta// mi 'gyur rtsa ba'i sngags bstan cing// bsgrub dang dmod pa drag sngags bstan// mkha' 'gro gnad nas bskul ba dang// drag po thun gyi 'phrin las dang// rdzas bzhi zor kha bzhi bsgrub dang// khrag la bsgrub cing dug gis gsad// kun gyi mchog tu yang snying bstan// ma mo'i dmag dpung dbab pa dang// dbang dang dam tshig bstan pa dang// yan lag 'phreng ba'i rim par bstan// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi gsang ba'i rgyud// nges par yang dag ngas bshad kyis// bde byed lha mo yid la zung// zhes gsungs so// nag mo ral pa spyi bcings gsang ba'i rgyud he sdud 'bar ma las/ gleng gzhi'i rtog pa

dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khrag thung chen pos/ 'phrin las kyi rim pa gdug pa sngags kyi mtshon cha rno dbal bshad pa'i phyir/ bsgral ba'i zhing du dmigs pa 'di dag gsungs so// thog mar shes bya blos spyangs te/ bla med byang chub rjes bsgrub bas// sangs rgyas bstan pa dam pa la// gnod pa bsgral ba'i zhing bstan pa// nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ni// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon gsod// rdo rje nang gi dme byed pa// srog la nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing// slob dpon bka' bslus dran phyar sems// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun bcad nas// gsang ba'i man ngag spel ba ni// don las nyams pas sgral ba'i zhing// sku mtshang 'bru dang a ka 'don// yang dag don la skur ba 'debs// don las nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// bya rung mi rung sna tshogs byed// rdzas dang lag cha mngon par ston// sbyor sgrol 'phrin las 'chol bar spyod// dam nyams de ni bsgral ba'i zhing// lta ba chos nyid rgyab tu bor// log pa'i spyod pa mang du len// man ngag don rtags log par go/ pha rol don la log chos pa'i// don ni phyi ci log la mkhas// bka' gzhung bor nas log par brtson// dam las nyams pa'i bsgral ba'i zhing// skye gnas bdag dang mi gcig par// sngon gyi khon 'gras med kyang ni// nyes med gzhan la gnad du 'dzugs// srog la 'ching zhing log tshig smra// rang don bor nas gzhan la rku// bdag la mthu dang rtsal 'ded pa// dbang med gnad la 'dzugs pa ni// las kyi nyams pa bsgral ba'i zhing// slob dpon gsang nas rang che 'byin// bka' rkun byas nas gzhan la 'tshong// de yang bsgral ba'i zhing yin no// dge 'dun sngags sde'i dbyen byed cing// sngags kyi bstan pa nub pa dang// sbyor ba sngags kyi mthu bzlog mkhan// ur mo 'drol ba'i bar du 'jug/ nyams pa chen po bsgral ba'i zhing// gnyis med don la phyag char 'dzin// thugs dam can gyi bsam gtan dkrug/ nga ni mthu dang rtsal che zer// gzhan la khro zhing gnad du 'dzugs// mtshams mas nyams pas bsgral ba'i zhing// gnyan pas go zhing rtog med par// mthu chen btsan par 'dod pa yis// las kyi gtso ru mtshan ma spyod// las thod khur nas dmar snod btags// 'dod pa'i nor gyis snying brus nas// gsod par shes kyang 'dod pas brgyal// gong du phung yang sngags pa 'joms// dug tu shes kyang lto ru za// gnyan zhing btsun yang thabs kyis smod// thob tu 'dod na gsang sngags rku// bza' ru 'dod na rnal 'byor za// zas su bsgrub pa'i longs spyod za// 'dod pas nyams pas bsgral pa'i zhing// bsgral ba'i zhing ni nyams pa bcu// dben ris

'joms shing rnal 'byor 'tshe// sangs rgyas bstan pa snub pa kun// ting 'dzin sngags dang sbyor ka bsgral// des kyang gsod par ma gyur na// sbyor ba rdzas kyis bsgral ba dang// mtshon cha rnon pos bsgral kyang ni// de dag bsgral na rnal 'byor btsun// bdud rnams btul bas bstan pa 'phel// gnod byed bsgral bas bar chad nyung// de dag ma bsgral dmyal khams 'phel// gzhung bsrong rnal 'byor sgyid lug nas// gsang sngags theg pa'i chos sgo 'gag/ nag po'i phyogs kyi bdud rnams kyang/ gzengs mtho bstan pa'i bar du gcod// phyin ci log gi bstan pa 'phel// de nas bsgral ba'i dmigs su bshad// ces gsungs so// nag mo ral pa gcig pa'i 'phrin las gsang ba'i rgyud he sdud 'bar ma las/ bsgral ba dmigs brtags pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal gyis/ 'phrin las kyi bdag mo mkha' 'gro ma bzhin du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag gam// rdza drung dmar nag 'jigs pa 'am// dmar nag brag ri rtsi shing can// yang na brag dmar chos bzangs 'dra// shin tu dben ba'i gnas su bsgrub// dam tshig bdag mo yin pas na// yi dam bsgom zhing bla ma mchod// bdun dang bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ dam tshig dbang gi las la byon// ma nyes dbang gzugs gser skyems gtang// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal brtsigs// dmar nag gru gsum mda' gang la// dbub nas bzhi ldan me ri 'bar// zla gam dmar po mu khyud dkar// gru chad khrag mtsho'i sgo bzhi mdzes// mtha' ma dmar nag me ris brgyan// khang bu gru gsum de dag tu// dza bzhi rtsa ba'i snying po bri// zhi ba khyams la 'khor gyi sngags// nag mo 'bum phrag rdzogs par bri// khang pa zur gsum lcags phur gsum// snying gsum ldan pa'i dgod par bya// thod pa ja ril dag tu yang// rak+ta dir bu gsum yang dgram// bya nag mkha' lding dar lces brgyan// shel nag dung gi thig les brgyan// nam gyi gung res bstan bya zhing// zhag lnga'i nub mo thugs dam bskang// shel nag bsgral ba'i tsit+ta yang// dam du bcas la rta ru bzung// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pas bsgrub// gdung ba'i dbyangs la ma mo bsten// sbos chen du ba rgyun mi bcad// tshil chen mar me rgyun du btang// thod pa'i rnga brdung rkang gling 'bud// me tog sna tshogs mdangs kyis bskang// bskang dang bshags pa rgyun du bya// dza bzhi bod pa'i gsang sngags kyang// smra ba bcad de mtshan mo bzlas/ rak+ta dmar chen brlab bya zhing// ming nas bod dang bskang gso bya// dmar gyi gtor ma cha re la// mkhan rgyas gnad nas bskul bya

zhing// srod dang tho rangs rgyun du btang// dus bzhi'i rgyal mos las la bskul// ming rus gzugs su bcas pa yang// khang ba gru gsum nang du gzhug/ las kyi bya ba rdzogs pa dang// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jug/ mi rtog bde chen mnyam pa'i sku// spros bral de nyid mnyam pa'i ngang// snang med dbyings las khyab pa'o// snang srid ma lus sgyu ma'i ngang// snying rje chen po byams dang ldan// nam mkha'i gzugs brnyan chu zla 'dra// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// skye ba'i cho 'phrul mthing nag 'bar// de la sems kyi 'bras bu gzungs// mthing nag gru gsum nam mkha' la// rgya gram rlung gi dkyil 'khor gtams// rak+ta dmar gyi rgya mtsho 'khrug/ mchog phran sa gzhi keng rus gtams// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong// gru gsum mthing nag e klong du// srog gi snying po rgyud dang 'bras// oM ru ru ru ru/ ro hUM ro hUM/ ma hUM hUM/ tsa tsa ma ma/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// spu gri g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su dre rta rkang gsum bcibs// zhal dang shangs kyi rlangs pa las// bud med nag mo 'bum phrag 'gyed// dpal ldan smug nag re ma ti// sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la/ lcags kyu g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su chu glang sngon po chibs// zhal dang shangs kyi rlangs pa las// bud med smug nag 'bum phrag 'gyed// smug mo 'bum gyi dbus su bsam// dpal ldan ser mo me ma dza// sku mdog ser nag 'bar ba la// zor ba g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su sha ba yu chung chibs// zhal dang shangs kyi rlangs pa las// bud med ser nag 'bum phrag 'phro// ser nag 'bum gyi dbus su bsam// dpal ldan nag mo re ma dzu// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba la// khram bam g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su rnga mo rlung la chibs// zhal dang shangs kyi rlangs pa las// bud med dkar mo 'bum phrag 'phro// dkar mo 'bum gyi dbus su bsam// bud med nag mo 'bum gyi tshogs// nad dang rims kyi bdag mo ste// rlung nag 'tshub ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// nag mo thod pa'i khrag spyo ma// srog dbugs kun gyi bdag mo ste// hUM ma mo nag mo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hUM b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ mkha' dbyings klong yangs brdal ba yi// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste// gru gsum e yi pho brang nas// nad kyi bdag mo spyan drangs la// dam rdzas dbul zhing 'phrin las bcol// de nas srog gi snying po drang// oM tad+ya thA/ da ru+u ro 'go de swAhA/ ba ti si ru ru be swAhA/ rtsa ba'i snying po lus kyi tshul// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig srog gi snying po bzhis 'bod cing bsnyen pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ oM tad+ya thA/ trag rag sha ru

pi nan mugs ti baM ru lu ru lu dza dza/ oM pad+ma ra ti re ma ti tsit+ta ru lu ru lu dza dza/ oM ru lu ko hUM me sen me na nan dzA dzA/ oM u sti du ru du ru tshal pa me dzA dzA/ ma mo thugs khar ma nyid las// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// srog rtsa 'gugs pa'i 'phreng ba bskor// dam tshig bdag mo las la byon// de tshe grub rtags mngon du ster// ma dang sring mo grogs mo dang// gnag dang rgya mtsho 'khyil ba dang// mon mo btsun mo na chung ma// rgyan ldan mdzes pas yid 'ong byed// rlung tshub kha ba 'brug dang sgra// thog ser la sogs 'byung bar byed// de la tshad ma'i rtags bzung ba// grub rtags bstan pa 'di lta ste// dngos su ston dang mun nag dang// nyams dga' byin che shes pa bstan// dam rdzas 'phel gyi na lud pa'o// dngos grub blang zhing 'phrin las brtsams// gtor ma gtang zhing 'phrin la bcol// nyams 'jigs bying zhing seng bor byed// me thum mtho dang 'od dkar dang// gnyid bro bying zhing skyo ba dang// khyim du 'gro snying 'dod pa ni// ma mo ma grub pa yi rtags// de la shel nag mkha' lding gis// bskang zhing bsnyen pa gnad la dbab// ma dang sring mo bran mo dang// dam cha phyag 'tshal bsgo ba nyan// dre'u dang bong bu 'ong ba ni// ma mo dbang du 'dus pa yin// dam rdzas byin la las la spyar// ma mo mi bsrun ral pa can// mdog ni sdug cing khro ba dang// dzo mor 'ong dang chung mar 'ong// gcan gzan 'ong na grub kyang ni// ma mo dbang du ma 'dus pas// lta ba gyab dang gnyen po stobs// ma mo dbang du bsdu bar bya// bud med nang 'thab byed pa dang// bya nag 'thab dang du ba lhags// mtshon cha'i char pa dbab pa dang// me tog char pa 'bebs pa dang// khrag gi na bun byung ba na// ma mo 'khrug pa'i rtags yin te// ma trang bzhi bsnol mdos bzhi la// rigs kyi gtso mo bzhi yi rdzas// bsags te thugs dam mdos kyis bskang// lto bkres kha spyal du brau zhing// 'gro snying 'dod dang snying mi dga'// cha lugs ston dang mtshan ma ston// dbang rtags ston dang du ba lhags// ma mo log pa'i rtags yin pas// tshogs dang dam rdzas rnams kyis bskang// rtags kyi rnam pa gang la yang// re dang dga' dang 'jigs pa yang// ngan pas sems ni ma bslad par// re dang dga' dang 'jigs pa spang// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// mkha' 'gro ma bzhi gnad la bskul zhing pho nyar gtang ba dang/ bskang ba'i las bya ba dang/ dam rdzas byin te srung mar mnga' gsol ba dang/ las thams cad kyi mngag par thugs dam bskul ba 'di dag gsungs so// nam mkha' khams kyi dbyings phyug ma// gnam phyed steng nas gon pas sbyi bo zangs se

zangs// sa phyed gdan du bting yang rkang mthil stong bar las// khru gang tsam gyi gnam ma bslebs// chags gang gyis tsam sam bslebs// ral pa phyed kyis gnam khabs ma// ral pa phyed kyi sa khabs ma// ral pa'i zer la skar 'phrul ma// khrag dang zhag gi thig les mtshan// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// nam mkha' khams kyi dpal mo btsan// chibs su 'brug mo 'tshams la chibs// rol du glog mo 'gyur la rol// spyan nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// shangs nas rlung 'byung srid gsum 'gengs// zhal nas hus btabs srid gsum skems// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan pho nya ni// nam mkha' khams kyi pa rna sha ba ri// sku la sha thul mnyen mo gsol// phyag na zhags 'dom dgu brgya dgu bcu bsnams// chibs su sha ba yu chung chibs// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// nam gyi gung la rgyu zhing dgra yi snying// 'jib cing gsol ba'i lho mo nam gru ma/ chibs su spyan rno 'ug pa chibs// phyag na khrag skam lcags kyu bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// bar snang khams kyi gzi 'phreng ma// mdzes pa'i sku+u la gzi yi thul pa gsol// chibs su bya rgyal khyung la chibs// phyag na gzi yi khram bam bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// bar snang khams kyi dbang phyug ma// chibs su rlung dang bu yug chibs// phyag na kha char ser ba bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// bar snang khams kyi glog ma srin// chibs su stag mo grus ma chibs// phyag na g.yu yi zhags pa sngon po bsnams// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// dpal ldan nag mo re ma ti// sku stod re lde nag po gsol// sku smad dred kyi pags pa gsol// chibs su tre rta nag po chibs// srin po'i ya mgal snga ru bgyis// srin po'i ma mgal phyi ru bgyis// srin po'i pags bas sga g.yog bgyis// sbrul nag 'khril bas gong rmed bgyis// de lta bu yi chibs la chibs// phyag ma g.yas na bdud kyi khram bam bsnams/ sngags 'chang bdag gi dgra bo 'di// khram la gdab pa'i dus la bab// phyag na g.yon na nad kyi rkyal ba thogs// sngags 'chang bdag gi dgra bo la// mi nad khrag nad rlangs thabs btang du gsol// 'phongs na mtshon gyi gru gu bsnams// mtshon nad khrag tu skyug tu chug/ gong na shod kyi sde'u cung bsnams// dgra bo shod la bor du gsol// khyodakyi thugs dam dus la bab// de yi bka' nyan gsung sdod ni// dpal ldan nag mo re

ma ti// na bza' smug nag gtibs pa gsol// me stag stong gi cha gas bskor// chibs su klu glang nag po chibs// rgyug ni dur khrod klong na rgyug/ len ni spyugs pa'i glu rgyangs len// 'bebs min ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs// za ni mi sha rlon pa za// 'gengs ni grags pas stong gsum 'gengs// 'thung ni rta khrag rlon pa 'thung// bzhin ni mig rtsa dmar por ston// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// ming dgu bos kyang re ma ti// mkhan rgyas bskul kyang re ma ti// nad bdag mo yi dus la bab// ces ched du gsungs so// nag mo ral pa spyi bcings gsang ba'i rgyud las/ re ma ti mched bzhi bsgrub cing thugs dam bskul ba'i rtog pa gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khrag 'thung gis/ snang srid ma mo thams cad kyi srog gi snying po de kho na/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yi rtsa sngags su btus te gsungs so// nag mo tshogs kyi gtso mo yi// srog gi snying po btu bya ba// rgyu rkyen gnyis la yig 'brur shar// ming dang dbyangs kyi sde las btus// rnam par snang mdzad dbu ru gzhag/ dgu yi gsum pa'i dang po la// gsum pa'i gsum gyis rab tu spras// drug pa'i dang po gral la bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i gnyis pa'o// de'i 'og gsum pa'i dang po la/ 'og tu drug pa'i gsum pas brgyan// dang po'i gsum pas spras pa'o// drug pa yi ni gsum pa la// dang po'i yi ni gsum pas spras// de 'og bdun pa'i dang po gzhag/ drug pa'i gsum pa dag la ni// 'og tu dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan// lnga pa yi ni dang po la// dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng du brgyan// gsum pa'i lnga pa gnyis su ldan// lnga pa'i lnga pa dag la ni// 'og tu dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan// dang po yi ni gsum pa dang// bdun pa'i gsum pa gral gcig bzhag/ bdun pa yi ni gsum pa la// 'og tu gsum pa'i dang pos brgyan// steng du dbyangs kyi bdun pas spras// drug pa'i gnyis pa'i steng du yang// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa bzhag/ drug pa yi ni gsum pa la// 'og tu dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan// de 'og drug pa'i bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pas 'og tu brgyan// de 'og tu yang de bzhin no// de 'og gnyis pa'i gsum pa gnyis// 'gug par byed pa'i lcags kyu'o// dgra bo'i snying lo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes btags na// rbad cing bsgrub pa'i sngags su bstan// nag mo 'bum gyi gtso mo yi// gsang sngags snying po de dag go/ dbu+u la rnam par snang mdzad de// lnga pa yi ni dang po la// gsum pa'i gsum pas gral du brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa'o// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pas te// gsum pa yi ni dang po la// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng du brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pa'i 'og tu yang// dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan pa'o//

de 'og gsum pa yi dang po la// dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng du brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pa de dag ste// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig rab tu brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i lnga pa'o// gsum pa yi ni dang po la// steng du dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan// gnyis pa yi ni dang po la// steng du dbyangs kyi gsum pa'o// gsum pa'i dang po de bzhin te// gnyis pa'i dang po steng du yang// dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan pa'o// drug pa dag ni gsum pa la// 'og tu dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan// drug pa'i bzhi pa dag la yang// 'og tu dbyangs yig lnga ldan pa'o// gnyis pa'i gsum pa gnyis su ste// lcags kyu srog gi de nyid do// dgra snying dag la dun b+h+yo b+h+yo// btags na bsgrub cing rbad pa'o// de dag smug mo'i gtso mo yi// gsang sngags nor bu'i 'phreng ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin dbur// drug pa yi ni gsum pa la// 'og tu dbyangs kyi lnga yis brgyan// drug po bzhi pa'i 'og tu yang// dbyangs kyi lnga pas brgyan pa ste// dang po yi ni dang po la// dbyangs kyi bcu gsum steng du brgyan// gral du sdud pa lnga pa'o// lnga pa'i lnga pa de bzhin te// bdun pa'i gsum pa'i steng du yang// dbyangs kyi bcu gcig brgyan pa'o// gral du gsum pa'i lnga pa bzhag/ gsum pa'i lnga pa gnyis gral gcig/ gnyis pa'i gsum pa gnyis gnyis te// bsnyen cing bod pa'i lcags kyu'o// ru lu ru lu dgra snying la// b+h+yo b+h+yo btags na bsgrub pa ste// ser mo'i gtso mo sngags bshad pa'o// dbu+u la rnam par snang mdzad do// de 'og dbyangs kyi drug pa la// steng du lnga pa'i lnga pas brgyan// bdun pa yi ni gsum pa la// 'og tu gsum pa'i dang pos brgyan// steng du dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// 'og tu a li lnga pas te// drug pa yang ni gsum pa la// a le lnga pa 'og tu ldan// gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la// a li lnga pa 'og tu'o// drug pa'i gsum pa'i 'og tu yang// a li lnga pa de bzhin no// gnyis pa yi ni gnyis pa la// drug pa'i bzhi pa gral la bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i dang pos te// lnga pa'i lnga pa steng du yang// a li bcu gcig pa yis brgyan// gnyis pa'i gsum pa gnyis bzhag pa'o// de dag 'bod pa'i yi ge ste// ru lu ru lus dgra snying la// b+h+yo b+h+yo btags na bsgrub pa'o// dkar mo'i gtso mo sngags btu ba'o// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag ni// rgyun du rnal 'byor byas pa na// dgra brgya yod kyang nub re la// snying brgya phyung nas bdag la stobs// bgegs rigs stong phrag du ma srun// btsan phyug 'phan la dar ba dang// nor rdzas 'bru rnams yongs su 'phel// tshe ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs// stag dang me chu dur khrod dang// ma rungs gcan

gzan kha 'ching zhing// dgra dang dug gi mtshon las thar// phyi mar mi nub rgyal mtshan gyi// grags pa chen por 'di 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi mthu dril nas// mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ ma ma mugs thun rbad/ snying rtsa la mugs thun rbad/ srog pa rtsa la yaM rbad/ ma ma snying za ba'i tshil la sha ro la khrag thum ni dzi rbad// ma ma gtubs tsit+ta bam snying kha la rag khas b+h+yo tsa rbud// ma ma rus srog snying la ya khrag la dud rbad/ gsad pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa yin// srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi// srog gi snying po dril nas ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi po las la gzud// oM dzA dzA dzA dzA/ nag mo har hur nag mo har hur b+h+yo/ nag mo du ni tang hed b+h+yo/ nag mo sha la dzA dza/ nag mo'i snying la dzA dzA/ nag mo tsa la dzA dzA/ nag mo srog la dzA dzA/ nag mo dbugs la har hur b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i snying la dzA dzA/ rbad cing pho nya dgye ba ni// b+h+yo dzA dzA b+h+yo dzA dzA nag mo bam ri li li/ nag mo sha la ri li li/ nag mo khrag la ri li li/ nag mo rtsa la ri li li/ nag mo snying la ri li li/ nag mo srog la cho cho/ baM ri li li/ nag mo 'bum gyi srog bsdus pa/ ma mo nag mo b+h+yo/ ma mo dun ting ma las la dun dza dun b+h+yo/ srog gcod yang snying dril ba ni/ oM dzA dzA dzA dzA/ re ma ti ba sha tsa pa la dza dza/ snying rgyus tsa la dzA dzA/ rtsa rgyus srog pa rtsa la dza dza/ sha rgyus snying la dza dza/ snying rgyud dbugs la dza dza/ re ma ti pa sha rtsa pa la dzA dzA/ dgra bo'i snying la dza dza ma ra ya/ phur bu mtshon gyis gdab pa ni// dzA dzA re ma ti pa sha ca pa la dzA dzA/ nag mo dgra bo'i snying la thum ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i srog la thum ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i sha staM baM ril rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i dbugs la hur thum ma ra ya rbad/ nag mo dgra bo'i khrag la thum ril rbad/ pa tsa pa tsa ma ra ya thun ril rbad/ thun gyis brab pa'i gsang sngags ni// nag mo har hur nag mo dun ti hed/ nag mo sha la dza dza/ nag mo snying la dza dza/ nag mo dbugs la dza dza/ nag mo ting hur ting hur/ ma mo nag mo sha la tse ma b+h+yo/ mo mo nag mo snying rtsa ma b+h+yo/ ma mo nag mo dbugs rtse ma b+h+yo/ ma mo nag mo srog rtse ma b+h+yo/ a tse snying bam thun/ a tse khrag baM thun/ a tse dbugs bam thun/ re ma ti bla la thun b+h+yo/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra bo gnad la dbab pa'i cho ga drag sngags 'di dag gsungs so// re ma ti dgra bo'i tsit+ta ni/ sha la pa la tsakra du ya khug cig khug cig/ dza la sa mun ti/ shu shi hi ni ni shi ka shu rbud/ rak+ta tsakra tsakraM/ de ba ni shi shi thum thum rbad/ ya do mo ha sa da ka la zi na zi na shi ni rbad/ thum rag sha kha kha khug cig khug cig/ sid sing 'jam pa la lo dun

na/ dgra bo ni ma ra la dza/ nri ma ra ya dza/ de ba shag shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ de ba tsit+ta ye shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ tsit+ta ma la na shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ ma ma ga chu ya shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ na ma bus ye shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ sa ma ya yo ga ni shan ting ku ru ye swAhA/ rtsa ba las sngags grogs dang bcas// ma mo srog rgyun snying po'i don// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba ste// yang gsang mchog gis rim par gsungs// nag mo ral pa spyi bcings gsang ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags bstan pa ste rtog pa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed rdo rje des/ bstan pa'i dgra lnga 'dul ba'i phyir dgra sngags kyi dmod pa 'di dag ched du gsungs so// srog kha la thum thum snying 'du 'du snying la b+h+yo/ snying khrag rtsa la breng breng/ oM dza la ti khas mugs mugs/ hUM ha srog rtsa la thugs thugs/ khrag snyings la rbud rbud/ oM kyi kha lo kyi kha lo rbad/ snying rtsa snying rtsa rbad rbad rbud rbud/ nir nir snying nir/ snying rtsa mugs mugs/ thum thum su snying su rbad/ kha 'dar yed yed/ thuM thuM rbad/ se kha kha long rbad rbad/ yang smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ rag mo snying la ya tsa mo tri snying la shad shad/ ba ti tsakra srog la ya ya/ ma raM rak+sha dbugs la ya/ shi tsi ka ma ni sha dzA dzA/ ma hA mo sta baM mugs/ dmar ma za b+h+yo/ thun mugs ka sha de rbad/ yang smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ oM nri rag sha rag mo a/ hi ma ti ma 'du 'du snying la dzA dzA/ dun dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma rag mo dza pha la dun dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ trag rag sha kha mun tra snying la rag mo ni dun b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma rag mo dza dza/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma ma snying kha rag snying kha rag/ ma rag sha ma rag sha dza dzA/ ting ting ru ru re ma ti che ge mo'i srog pa rtsa la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ cho cho ya/ srog la ya ya/ shig shig b+h+yo/ yang smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ na rag mo hu ri tra hur b+h+yo/ ha ra ha ra kraM kraM mi sha dam/ kha kha ha ha tra tri tra traM dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo/ yang smras pa/ rag mo a dzA dzA thig kyi kha la ma b+h+yo/ la dza dzA ma thum/ ril snying rtsa 'du/ srog brig brig shig sha khyer b+h+yo/ rag mo Ar+ya re ma ti kha la/ yang smras pa/ hi pa ma he pa hi pa ya/ ru thum ru thum/ nag mo ral pa spyi bcings gsang ba'i rgyud las/ re ma ti'i dmod sngags bstan pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal gyis/ drag sngags kyi rim pa gsungs so// ma ma sha sha ru khrag ma du hring/ tsit+ta dgra bo'i snying la thun/ thun 'ub thun 'ub/ ril ril ma snying la ril ril/ trag rag sha ru khrag snying la dza dza/ sha sha khug/ du sha ma/ du ru ni ti sta rbad/ trig trig hring ma ma/ ru ru rag mo mak+Sha ni tsa ba la lha mo yaM dung hring ma ya du ma dzA dzA/ da du ma mu sha sha khug khug/ du sha ma ma baM ril du ting ma ma snying phyung/ sa ma ya srog chod/ du shan

du ya ma ma ti ril du ya/ sha sha ma ma rbad bu ya ya/ ni ni b+h+yo b+h+yo sod sod/ ma du ya ma du ya/ tshal pa rbad/ yed yed/ sha thum sha thum rbad/ tsa thur ma thur rbad/ sha thu ya b+h+yo/ tsa thum ma ya bzlog/ ma du sha sha dza dza/ ma du ma du sha dza dza/ ru+u ma da du ma ma/ baM kha shag baM kha shag/ ma du tsit+ta rbad/ ma na tsit+ta rbad/ ma ma tsit+ta rbad// tsit+ta tsit+ta ma ma/ yer yer/ kha thum rbad kha thum rbad/ ma ma kha tham ma ma kha tham/ tig sna rbad/ tig sna rbad/ mugs mug dgra sha la mug rbad rbad/ srog rtsa la rbad/ khaM khaM rbad ril srog thum ni dza/ grod grod/ sha la rbad/ srog thum ma ma tsig tsig/ srog la yaM yaM ma ma/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo/ naM naM ha ra ha de ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ rag mo te tsa na rag mo rag mi ni la kha thun ting ting chem chem/ krol krol sa ma ya sarba sbre sa ma sa la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ti ma shu shu yag sha nag mo khA hi/ shri de bi ma hA ka li khA hi/ rag mo rag sha khA hi/ ma rag mo dun ting khA hi/ ma rag mo rag mo khrag la mi khA hi/ ma ma mugs ti gri na khA ti/ ma re ma ti khA hi/ ma re ma ti ma nu rag mo khA hi/ tre mo shu shu yag sha nag mo khA hi/ zhes gsungs pas srog chad pa dang/ sha rus zad pa dang/ mdze nad
